title: Yelp Review Scraper Input Schema
description: Configuration schema for the Yelp review scraper CLI.

items.description: Yelp business URLs to scrape reviews from.

startUrls.description: List of Yelp business listing URLs.

maxPages.description: Maximum number of review pages to crawl per business URL.

maxReviewsPerPage.description: Optional cap on the number of reviews to collect from each page.

outputFile.description: Optional output JSON file path. Defaults to a timestamped file inside the data directory.
